quorumcard.name: Accept Prophecy
quorumcard.text: Draw 1 card (any color). Next time a player activates Administration or chooses the President with the Admiral's Quarters, difficulty +2, then discard this card.

quorumcard.name: Arrest Order
quorumcard.text: Send a character to the Brig.

quorumcard.name: Assign Arbitrator
quorumcard.text: Draw 2 politics (yellow) and pick any other player. When anyone activates Admiral's Quarters, Arbitrator can discard this card to move difficulty +/-3, then discard this card.

quorumcard.name: Assign Mission Specialist
quorumcard.text: Draw 2 politics (yellow) and assign Specialist. On next Jump, Specialist chooses 3 destination cards and picks 1, instead of Admiral, then discard this card.

quorumcard.name: Assign Vice President
quorumcard.text: Draw 2 politics (yellow) and name VP. Only VP can become President via Administration

quorumcard.name: Authorization of Brutal Force
quorumcard.text: Destroy 3 Raiders, 1 Heavy, or 1 Centurion. Roll 1-2 -> -1 Population

quorumcard.name: Encourage Mutiny
quorumcard.text: Pick non-Admiral player. Target: Roll 1-2 ‚Üí -1 morale; 3-8 -> become Admiral

quorumcard.name: Presidential Pardon
quorumcard.text: Move any other character from the Brig to any other location on Galactica.

quorumcard.name: Release Cylon Mugshots
quorumcard.text: Pick player and view 1 random Loyalty card. Roll 1-3 -> -1 morale.
